Commentary.ab: Y22.30b vaŋhuδā̊biiō] Bartholomae (vaŋhu-dāh-, cf. hu-dāh-); Geldner vaŋhuδābiiō. Cf. Y16.9 vaŋhuδā̊ŋhō (vid. Parallels).
Y22.30b yesńiiāca] sec. cod.; Geldner yasniiāca.

RecitationInstruction.ab: Y22.30a āiiese yešti vīspaēibiiō ...] āiie. vīspaēibiiō aṣ̌ahe ratubiiō OD viδuuā̊ mraotū (Y23.0) 672.

Parallels.ab: vīspaēibiiō vaŋhuδā̊biiō yazataēbiiō maińiiaōibiiascā gaēϑiiaēibiiascā ~ Y16.9 vīspā̊ maińiiauuaca yazata gaēϑiiāica yōi vaŋhuδā̊ŋhō aṣ̌auuanō; ~ Y71.5 vīspaēca aṣ̌auuanō maińiiauuaca yazata gaēϑiiāca yazamaide
yazataēibiiō maińiiaōibiiascā gaēϑiiaēibiiascā ~ Yt19.22 maińiiauanąm yazatanąm gaēiϑiianąmca
maińiiaōibiiascā gaēϑiiaēibiiascā~ Y3.4, Y7.5, maińiiauuanąm gaēϑiianąm ~ Y19.20, Y20.4 maińiiaōmca gaēϑīmca

yōi həṇti yesńiiāca vaɱiiāca aṣ̌āt̰ haca yat̰ vahištāt̰ ~ Y71.10 yōi tē həṇti yasńiiāca vaɱiiāca aṣ̌āt̰ haca yat̰ vahištāt̰; ~ Yt8.15, Yt8.17, Yt8.19 aɱi yesńiiasca vaɱiiasca aŋᵛhe astuuaite aṣ̌at̰ haca yat̰ vahištāt̰; ~ VrS2.11, VrS17.19, VrS77.10 yōi aōxta [...] yesńiiāca vaɱiiāca aṣ̌āt̰ haca yat̰ vahištāt̰.

yesńiiāca vaɱiiāca = Yt13.153; ~ Y62.1, Yt10.91 yesńiiō ahi vaɱiiō yesńiiō buiiā̊ vaɱiiō; ~ Yt10.5, Yt10.78, Yt14.54 yesńiiō vaɱiiō; ~ Yt13.34 yesńiiā̊ vaɱiiā̊; ~ Yt13.42 yesńiiąm vaɱiiąm; ~Yt13.152 yesńiiōtəməm hātąm vaɱiiōtəməm; ~ Yt13.152 yesńiiasca vaɱiiasca
aṣ̌āt̰ haca yat̰ vahištāt̰ = Y19.11, Y68.7, YtWahr18.2, YtWahr18.3.
